title: Ichika Nikki
description:
Vol. 1 - This is a cute, fluffy story about a persnickety, grumpy cat who loves and adores her owner. She, however, does not like her owner's lover, and her constant enjoyment is annoying him or fighting with him. There is also the adorable neighbors - step-father and son - and the son LOVES Ichika.

Vol. 2 - Ichika still doesn't like Mitsugu, and to add to her misery, it seems a bald bird has joined the family. In Story 2, Saya and Mitsugu go away, so Ichika is baby-sat by the Shishimori family.

Vol. 3 - This is a story about a cat who lives with her wonderful owner, his not so loved boyfriend, a savage bird, and now a Corgi puppy. Can life be any more annoying?
